sprint_goal: Establish the foundational backend, including the secure Jint execution engine, basic script persistence with encryption, and API access control.
epic_coverage: Core Data Transformation Engine, Script Management & Versioning, Security & Compliance
key_deliverables: Secure Jint transformation service, encrypted script storage, performance benchmark suite, and role-based access control for APIs and UI navigation.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a script execution via an integration test. Show encrypted data in the database. Run performance benchmark. Show access denied for non-admin role.
success_criteria: Performance benchmark passes. All security constraints are validated by integration tests. DPAPI encryption is confirmed working.
risk_factors: Jint engine performance (RISK-002). DPAPI key management complexity (RISK-003). Jint sandbox escape (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategies: Execute performance benchmark early. Rigorous security review of Jint sandbox configuration. Document DPAPI production setup requirements.
burndown_target: Complete 40 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_name: Sprint 2: Core Admin UI & Preview API
sprint_goal: Deliver the core administrator experience by building the rich script editor UI and the essential preview functionality for rapid development and debugging.
epic_coverage: Control Panel UI for Script Management, System Integration & API
key_deliverables: Monaco-based script editor with syntax validation. Three-pane preview UI. Backend API for sample data and live data previews with timeout enforcement.
demo_objectives: Show real-time syntax validation. Demonstrate previewing a script with sample JSON. Demonstrate previewing with live data from a connector. Show timeout error for a long-running script.
success_criteria: End-to-end preview functionality is operational. Editor UI is responsive and provides helpful validation. API timeout is proven to work.
risk_factors: Monaco Editor integration complexity (RISK-006). Potential for UI performance issues.
mitigation_strategies: Use lazy-loading for the Monaco component. Define clear API contracts early.
integration_windows: Frontend/Backend integration for Preview API on days 3-5.
burndown_target: Complete 35 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement critical change management and compliance features, including script versioning logic and a comprehensive, immutable audit trail for all sensitive operations.
epic_coverage: Script Management & Versioning, Security & Compliance, Quality & Documentation
key_deliverables: Backend logic for script versioning (update, revert). API endpoints for version management. A secure, tamper-evident audit logging service. OpenAPI specification and User Guide documentation.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate saving a script creates a new version. Show an API call to revert to a previous version. Show audit log entries for script creation and sandbox violations.
success_criteria: All script management and execution events are captured in the audit log. Versioning logic is transactional and robust. Documentation is clear and accurate.
risk_factors: Audit log immutability for compliance (RISK-004). Transactional integrity of versioning logic (RISK-005).
mitigation_strategies: Early architectural review of the audit log storage solution. Specific integration tests for transactional rollbacks.
burndown_target: Complete 37 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Enhance the feature set with the versioning UI (diff/revert), operational monitoring via Prometheus, and advanced data validation rules to improve system robustness.
epic_coverage: Control Panel UI for Script Management, Operational Readiness & Monitoring, Advanced Data Handling & Validation
key_deliverables: UI for version history, comparison, and revert. Prometheus metrics endpoint. Data size limits in report pipeline. JSON Schema validation capability.
demo_objectives: Show the version history UI. Compare two script versions side-by-side. Revert a script from the UI. Show metrics on a Prometheus dashboard. Demonstrate a job failing due to a size limit or schema validation error.
success_criteria: All UI enhancements are functional and accessible. Monitoring endpoint provides accurate metrics. Validation rules correctly fail jobs as expected.
risk_factors: Third-party diff viewer integration complexity. Performance of JSON Schema validation on large objects.
mitigation_strategies: Select a well-documented diff viewer library. Benchmark schema validation performance early.
burndown_target: Complete 31 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Prepare the feature for production rollout by creating migration tools, comprehensive documentation, and adding quality-of-life improvements like internationalization.
key_deliverables: Feature flag for the entire transformation feature. A documented legacy data migration script. Internationalized error messages. Administrator training materials.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate enabling/disabling the feature with the flag. Run the migration script against sample legacy data. Show an error message in both English and Spanish.
success_criteria: Feature flag works as expected. Migration script is functional and well-documented. Error messages are successfully internationalized.
risk_factors: Legacy data format is more complex than anticipated, delaying migration script development.
mitigation_strategies: Perform a data analysis spike on legacy data before starting the migration script task.
integration_windows: Final feature freeze and end-to-end testing.
burndown_target: Complete 40 hours by end of week 1.
